subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: The top-ranked Djokovic will face Murray, who defeated No. 12 seed Feliciano López, 6-3, 6-4, at the BNP Paribas Open.
snippet: The top-ranked Djokovic will face Murray, who defeated No. 12 seed Feliciano López, 6-3, 6-4, at the BNP Paribas Open.
